Rogier Timmer ​

  • Enschede

Profile ​

Creative and thorough Mechanical Engineering student with hands-on experience tutoring and organizing student programs. Comfortable with numerical computing, simulation tools and Linux-based workflows. Eager to apply High-Tech Systems & Materials knowledge in research or industry.

Work Experience ​

Intern ​

August 2025 - November 2025 GKN Fokker Technologies, Hoogeveen

  • Working on the development of the recycling of thermoplastic composites used in aerospace applications.
  • Creating test setups for experimental validation of numerical models.

Student Assistant ​

April 2022 – now University of Twente

  • Student assistant for the courses: Manufacturing Systems, Production Management, and Simulation of Injection moulding
  • Project tutor for first- and second-year Mechanical Engineering students.

Secretary & Education Officer — International Studytour ​

May 2024 – June 2025 W.S.G. Isaac Newton, Enschede

  • Organized logistics and communications for a 3-week international study tour (Japan & Thailand) with 32 students.
  • Designed and taught a course comparing Industry 4.0 practices across the Netherlands, Thailand and Japan; concluded with a symposium.

Shelf Stacker ​

June 2019 – September 2020 Jumbo, Westerbork

  • Seasonal position, responsible for shelf replenishment and stock handling.
